title: Victoria's Favourite Things. Segment 7
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Victoria - Social life and customs
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Interactive media
abstract: People who love Melbourne, warm coats, hockey, best friends and memories
description: The results of July 2004's Open House weekend program 'Victoria's Favourite Things'. This segment features Jenny from Tasmania talking about her favourite place - Melbourne - and the warm coat she wears when she visits; Ripponlea cherishes her memories; Casey from Hastings just loves hockey; Lucy and Chloe are favourite friends; and Clemet talks about Victoria and Melbourne City.
